mapper.select: select count(*) as totalRespondent, count(case when rd.GENDER='male' then 1 end) as totalMale, count(case when rd.GENDER='female' then 1 end) as totalFemale, count(case when rd.GENDER='others' then 1 end) as totalOthers from tb_questionnaire_respondents rd join tb_questionnaire_header_master hdq on rd.QUESTIONNAIRE_HEADER_ID =hdq.ID where hdq.ID =#{headerId}

select tc.CODE_NAME as name ,count(rd.RESPONDENT_ID) AS value from tb_questionnaire_respondents rd join tb_codebook tc on tc.CODE_TYPE='AGE_RANGE' and rd.age between tc.ETC1 and tc.ETC2 where rd.QUESTIONNAIRE_HEADER_ID =#{headerId} group by tc.CODE_NAME;

select rd.RESPONDENT_ID ,rd.QUESTIONNAIRE_HEADER_ID ,rd.NAME ,rd.AGE ,rd.GENDER ,rd.CREATED_DATE from tb_questionnaire_respondents rd join tb_questionnaire_header_master hdq on rd.QUESTIONNAIRE_HEADER_ID = hdq.ID where hdq.ID =#{headerId}

select rep.NAME as name ,res.RESPONSE_TEXT as value from tb_questionnaire_responses res join tb_questionnaire_respondents rep on res.RESPONDENT_ID=rep.RESPONDENT_ID join tb_questionnaire_header_master hdq on res.QUESTIONNAIRE_HEADER_ID =hdq.ID join tb_questionnaire_q_master qm on res.QUESTION_ID =qm.ID left join tb_codebook tc on qm.ANSWER_TYPE =tc.CODE_ID and tc.CODE_TYPE ='ANSWER_TYPE' where tc.ETC1 in ('text','textarea') and hdq.ID =#{headerId} and res.QUESTION_ID =#{questionId} order by res.CREATED_DATE
limit 5

select res.RESPONSE_TEXT as name ,res.RESPONSE_TEXT as value from tb_questionnaire_responses res join tb_questionnaire_header_master hdq on res.QUESTIONNAIRE_HEADER_ID =hdq.ID join tb_questionnaire_q_master qm on res.QUESTION_ID =qm.ID left join tb_codebook tc on qm.ANSWER_TYPE =tc.CODE_ID and tc.CODE_TYPE ='ANSWER_TYPE' where tc.ETC1 in ('text','textarea','radio','select','checkbox') and hdq.ID =#{headerId} and res.QUESTION_ID =#{questionId} and res.RESPONDENT_ID=#{respondentId} order by res.CREATED_DATE

select rep.NAME as name ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(res.RESPONSE_TEXT , '%a %b %d %Y %H:%i:%s'),'%Y-%m-%d') as value from tb_questionnaire_responses res join tb_questionnaire_respondents rep on res.RESPONDENT_ID=rep.RESPONDENT_ID join tb_questionnaire_header_master hdq on res.QUESTIONNAIRE_HEADER_ID =hdq.ID join tb_questionnaire_q_master qm on res.QUESTION_ID =qm.ID left join tb_codebook tc on qm.ANSWER_TYPE =tc.CODE_ID and tc.CODE_TYPE ='ANSWER_TYPE' where tc.ETC1 in ('date') and hdq.ID =#{headerId} and res.QUESTION_ID =#{questionId} order by res.CREATED_DATE
limit 5

select rep.NAME as name ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(res.RESPONSE_TEXT , '%a %b %d %Y %H:%i:%s'),'%Y-%m-%d') as value from tb_questionnaire_responses res join tb_questionnaire_respondents rep on res.RESPONDENT_ID=rep.RESPONDENT_ID join tb_questionnaire_header_master hdq on res.QUESTIONNAIRE_HEADER_ID =hdq.ID join tb_questionnaire_q_master qm on res.QUESTION_ID =qm.ID left join tb_codebook tc on qm.ANSWER_TYPE =tc.CODE_ID and tc.CODE_TYPE ='ANSWER_TYPE' where tc.ETC1 in ('date') and hdq.ID =#{headerId} and res.QUESTION_ID =#{questionId} and res.RESPONDENT_ID=#{respondentId} order by res.CREATED_DATE

select res.RESPONSE_TEXT as name ,count(res.RESPONSE_ID) as value from tb_questionnaire_responses res join tb_questionnaire_header_master hdq on res.QUESTIONNAIRE_HEADER_ID =hdq.ID join tb_questionnaire_q_master qm on res.QUESTION_ID =qm.ID left join tb_codebook tc on qm.ANSWER_TYPE =tc.CODE_ID and tc.CODE_TYPE ='ANSWER_TYPE' where tc.ETC1 in ('radio','select','checkbox') and hdq.ID =#{headerId} and res.QUESTION_ID =#{questionId} group by res.RESPONSE_TEXT
